summary: This bill, the Veterans Scam And Fraud Evasion Act of 2025 (VSAFE Act of 2025), aims to protect veterans from fraud and scams. It establishes a Veterans Scam and Fraud Evasion Officer within the Department of Veterans Affairs. This officer will be responsible for fraud prevention, incident response, and directing veterans to relevant resources. The bill also mandates coordination with other federal agencies and veteran service organizations, and includes updates regarding payment limitations.
